column1: Table D2.14.4: Visits and time spent in homelands/traditional country, Indigenous Australians aged 18 and over(a), 2018–19
How often visits homelands/ traditional country
Longest time spent in homelands/traditional country(b)
† Estimate has a relative standard error between 25% and 50% and should be used with caution.
(a) All persons aged 18 and over who recognise an area as homelands/traditional country who do not currently live there, but can visit.
Note: Cells in this table containing data have been randomly adjusted to avoid the release of confidential data. Discrepancies may occur between sums of the component items and totals.
Source: AIHW and ABS analysis of National Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Health Survey 2018–19.
